languages.text: "Вам понадобится этот оберег". {n}Фелек протягивает драгоценный камень, лишенный всякой оправы. Сияющий и ледяной на ощупь, сколько ни грей в руках.{/n} "Если вам удастся обманом или силой прикоснуться к чудовищу этим оберегом — пагубное воздействие ее сил тут же ослабнет. Вы сможете забрать ее и покинуть станцию".

traits.locale_text: "Вам понадобится этот оберег". {n}Фелек протягивает драгоценный камень, лишенный всякой оправы. Сияющий и ледяной на ощупь, сколько ни грей в руках.{/n} "Если вам удастся обманом или силой прикоснуться к чудовищу этим оберегом — пагубное воздействие ее сил тут же ослабнет. Вы сможете забрать ее и покинуть станцию".

languages.text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."
languages.original_text: "Вам понадобится этот оберег". {n}Фелек протягивает драгоценный камень, лишенный всякой оправы. Сияющий и ледяной на ощупь, сколько ни грей в руках.{/n} "Если вам удастся обманом или силой прикоснуться к чудовищу этим оберегом — пагубное воздействие ее сил тут же ослабнет. Вы сможете забрать ее и покинуть станцию".

traits.locale_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a frame of any kind. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in the palm of your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a frame of any kind. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in the palm of your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

You will be able to take her and leave the station."

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

"You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

languages.text: "Ihr werdet diesen Glücksbringer brauchen." {n}Felek überreicht dir einen Edelstein ohne Fassung. Seine glänzende Oberfläche bleibt kalt, so lange du ihn auch in der Hand hältst.{/n} "Wenn es Euch gelingt, ihn gegen die Haut des Monsters zu drücken, ob gewaltsam oder durch eine List ... dann schwindet der unheilvolle Einfluss ihrer Macht. Dann könnt Ihr sie mitnehmen und mit ihr die Station verlassen."
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr werdet diesen Glücksbringer brauchen." {n}Felek überreicht dir einen Edelstein ohne Fassung. Seine glänzende Oberfläche bleibt kalt, so lange du ihn auch in der Hand hältst.{/n} "Wenn es Euch gelingt, ihn gegen die Haut des Monsters zu drücken, ob gewaltsam oder durch eine List ... dann schwindet der unheilvolle Einfluss ihrer Macht. Dann könnt Ihr sie mitnehmen und mit ihr die Station verlassen."

languages.text: « Vous allez avoir besoin de cette amulette », {n}dit Felek en vous remettant une pierre précieuse sans monture. Sa surface lumineuse reste froide au toucher même si vous la tenez longtemps.{/n} « Si vous parvenez à la mettre en contact avec la peau du monstre, par la force ou par la ruse, cela annulera l'influence néfaste de ses pouvoirs. Vous pourrez alors vous emparer d'elle et quitter la station. »
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

traits.locale_text: « Vous allez avoir besoin de cette amulette », {n}dit Felek en vous remettant une pierre précieuse sans monture. Sa surface lumineuse reste froide au toucher même si vous la tenez longtemps.{/n} « Si vous parvenez à la mettre en contact avec la peau du monstre, par la force ou par la ruse, cela annulera l'influence néfaste de ses pouvoirs. Vous pourrez alors vous emparer d'elle et quitter la station. »

languages.text: “您需要带上这件护身符。”{n}费雷克递给了你一块没有任何装饰的贵重宝石。哪怕你一直把它握在手里，它闪闪发光的表面都没有任何温度。{/n}“无论是用暴力还是用欺骗手段，只要您能将这个东西按在那头怪物身上，她的力量就会消退。在那之后，您就可以带着她离开星站了。”
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

traits.locale_text: “您需要带上这件护身符。”{n}费雷克递给了你一块没有任何装饰的贵重宝石。哪怕你一直把它握在手里，它闪闪发光的表面都没有任何温度。{/n}“无论是用暴力还是用欺骗手段，只要您能将这个东西按在那头怪物身上，她的力量就会消退。在那之后，您就可以带着她离开星站了。”

languages.text: 「このお守りが必要になるだろう」{n}フェレックは装飾もない裸の宝石を手渡した。キラキラ輝くその表面は、どれほど手持っていても冷たいままだ。{/n}「力ずくでもいい、頭を使ってもいい、お守りをあの怪物の肌に押し当てれば、あの力の恐ろしい影響力は弱くなる。あの人を連れてステーションを出れるだろう」
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

traits.locale_text: 「このお守りが必要になるだろう」{n}フェレックは装飾もない裸の宝石を手渡した。キラキラ輝くその表面は、どれほど手で触れていても冷たさは失われない。{/n}「力ずくでもいい、頭を使ってもいい、お守りをあの怪物の肌に押し当てれば、あの力の恐ろしい影響力は落ちる。あなたは、あの人を連れてステーションを後にできるだろう」
「このお守りが必要になるだろう」{n}フェレックは装飾もない裸の宝石を手渡した。キラキラ輝くその表面は、どれほど手持っていても冷たいままだ。{/n}「力ずくでもいい、頭を使ってもいい、お守りをあの怪物の肌に押し当てれば、あの力の恐ろしい影響力は弱くなる。あの人を連れてステーションを出れるだろう」

languages.text: «Necesitará este amuleto». {n}Felek te entrega una piedra preciosa sin engastar. Su superficie, luminosa, permanece fría por mucho que la sujetes en la mano.{/n} «Si logra colocarlo contra su piel, bien por maña, bien por fuerza, ¡la influencia nociva de sus poderes remitirá! Podrá llevársela y abandonar la estación».
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

traits.locale_text: «Necesitará este amuleto». {n}Felek te entrega una piedra preciosa sin engastar. Su superficie, luminosa, permanece fría por mucho que la sujetes en la mano.{/n} «Si logra colocarlo contra su piel, bien por maña, bien por fuerza, ¡la influencia nociva de sus poderes remitirá! Podrá llevársela y abandonar la estación».

languages.text: "Al bakayım şu tılsımı." {n}Felek, sana yuvasız bir mücevher veriyor. Işıltılı yüzeyi, elinde ne kadar tutarsan tut ısınmıyor.{/n} "Bunu ister zorla ister kandırarak cildine temas ettirebilirsen güçlerinin illet etkileri ortadan kalkacaktır. Böylece onu da alıp istasyondan ayrılabilirsin."
languages.original_text: "You are going to need this charm." {n}Felek hands you a precious stone without a setting. Its luminous surface remains cold to the touch no matter how long you hold it in your hand.{/n} "If you manage to press it against the monster's skin, whether by force or by guile, the baleful influence of her powers will recede. You will be able to take her and leave the station."

traits.locale_text: "Al bakayım şu tılsımı." {n}Felek, sana yuvasız bir mücevher veriyor.
